text: {| align=right border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=4 class=toccolours width=300 style="margin: 0 0 1em 1em; border-collapse: collapse; border: 1px #aaa solid" |+ style="margin-left: inherit; font-size: larger;" | Pedro Escobedo, Querétaro, Mexico |- | align="center" colspan="2" | {| style="background: none;" |align="center"| Coat of Arms |} |- |bgcolor=#E8E7DB| Latitude || 20.21° N |- |bgcolor=#E8E7DB| Longitude || 100.19° W |- |bgcolor=#E8E7DB| Municipal president || Francisco Perrusquía Nieves |- |bgcolor=#E8E7DB| Area || 290.9 km² |- |bgcolor=#E8E7DB| Population (2005) || 56,553 |- |bgcolor=#E8E7DB| HDI (2000) || 0.7598 |- |bgcolor=#E8E7DB| Time zone (UTC) || -6 UTC CST |- |bgcolor=#E8E7DB| GDP (per capita) (2000) || US$4.298,00 |- | align="center" colspan="2" | {| style="background: none;" |align="center"|Official website: ? |} |} left Pedro Escobedo is the seat of Pedro Escobedo Municipality of the State of Querétaro, part of the industrial corridor. title: Pedro Escobedo
